Content.Text:
<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. What brings you here today?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Wha? Y-you came to ask me out on a date? W-
well, that's very...sudden. Ah, well. Why not?
Let's go.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Erm. Th-there's something about being alone
together on a real date like this that makes it
hard to find things to talk about...
Talk to me about plants.
Let's use gestures instead!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure that's all right? I'd be happy to, of
course, but I always talk about plants. Won't you
get bored?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
R-really...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I appreciate it. Still, let's take this chance to talk
about something else for once.
<PAGE>
I know. Why don't you tell me some more about
yourself? Like what sorts of things do you like?
What don't you care for?
I like farming.
I like you.
Let's not talk about that.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_L>He he. I'm well aware of that. Whenever I see
you working, you always seem to be having a
good time.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>And I never hear you complain about all the hard
work. In fact, when you work so earnestly, you
look really cool--

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
ERM!! N-no, that's not what I...um...wait...no...
C-can we pretend I didn't say that, please?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I asked you to pretend you didn't hear it. Hmph!
You can be such a tease.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><FACE_LAUGH>But, no matter how much you tease, I know at
heart that you're a very kind person.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>I could never say I hated you, even as a joke. I l-
...l-...li...like you that much.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Augh...! I'm not cut out to say those sorts of
things out loud!
<PAGE>
I thought I'd take a page from your book and be
more open about my feelings, but I can't. I just
can't! I won't say it again!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
A-anyway! I just remembered, err...I left my
teapot on the burner! So I have to go. Now. See
you later, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_L>Wh-wh-wh-what do you think you're doing,
saying that out loud?! Th-that's not what I was
talking about!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
H-hey! You're having fun watching me now,
aren't you?
<PAGE>
Hmph! I never expected you to be such a tease!
<PAGE>
Why you...! I... I...!!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>L...l...like you. A lot.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>N-no matter how much you tease, I know at
heart that you're a very kind person.
<PAGE>
S-so I could never say I hated you, even as a
joke. I l-...l-...li...like you that much.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Augh...! How can you say these embarrassing
things out loud so easily?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>I can't. I just can't! I won't say it ever again!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
S-stop staring at me! With you looking at me
like that I...I don't know what I...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
WH-WH-WH-WHAT?!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
B-but I want to know everything about you!

Oops! I guess I went too far. She forgave me
after I apologized to her, but next time I
shouldn't tease her so much.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
R-really? Er, I apologize if I said anything that
offended you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ermmm...well then, I guess I will do as you
suggested and turn the topic to plants after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
No...It's nothing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Anyway, where was I? Oh yes. I heard there was
a new species of flower discovered recently,
and...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>. I'm afraid I have other
things I need to see to now. Er...thank you for
inviting me along today.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See you later...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is it really all right for me to know so little about
<MYNAME>? I mean, we're together now, aren't
we?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME> always takes such a flattering
interest in me that I wanted to learn a little more
about him in return...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
That's hardly what I meant! If you're going to
make a joke out of this, I don't want to go along
with it. I'm leaving.
